caption.p: Ligands docked in Mpro active site. Examples of ligands docked in the active site: (A) Amodiaquine; (B) Bonducellpin D; (C) Heptafuhalol; (D) Simeprevir; (E) Pitavastatin; (F) Eszopiclone. Ligands were docked using Autodock Vina with the protocol developed elsewhere [144]. The structural domains I, II and III of Mpro are colored in light blue, orange and green, respectively. (For interpretation of the references to color in this figure legend, the reader is referred to the web version of this article.)
